parameters.CHANNEL_PROFILE_COMMUNICATION: 0: (Default) The communication profile. This profile applies to scenarios such as an audio call or video call, where all users can publish and subscribe to streams.

parameters.CHANNEL_PROFILE_LIVE_BROADCASTING: 1: Live streaming. In this profile, you can set the role of users as the host or audience by calling setClientRole. A host both publishes and subscribes to streams, while an audience subscribes to streams only. This profile applies to scenarios such as a chat room or interactive video streaming.

parameters.CHANNEL_PROFILE_GAME: 2: Gaming. Agora does not recommend using this setting.
